text: vim-lsp 2021 の結果は、パフォーマンス向上になりました。 <https://github.com/prabirshrestha/vim-lsp/issues/1037>

attachments.title: Improving Perf · Issue #1037 · prabirshrestha/vim-lsp
attachments.text: Top request for vim-lsp 2021 was to improve perf. Before I start working on this I would like to hear specific on what users are seeing. For example: vim-lsp is slow when autocomplete is enabled bu...

attachments.fallback: GitHub: `Deol -edit -split -start-insert -toggle` does not start as insert mode · Issue #30 · Shougo/deol.nvim
attachments.title: `Deol -edit -split -start-insert -toggle` does not start as insert mode · Issue #30 · Shougo/deol.nvim
attachments.text: Deol -edit -split -start-insert works fine to start as insert mode Deol -edit -split -start-insert -toggle does not start as insert mode, at the 2nd time, with the following vimrc &quot; git/config...

text: 正確には、deol bufferでは入った瞬間にterminal-normal modeになるようにして、かつ、deol-edit bufferを-start-insert開いたときはdeol-edit bufferがちゃんとinsert modeになるようにする
いまのところうまく実現できてない
deol buffer (deol-editではなく:terminal側) に入ったときは無条件でつねにterminal-normal modeにしたいなあ
